titles.title: Honoring in praise and remembrance the wonderful achievements in academic, athletic and humanitarian distinction of Quincy Williams.
Honoring in praise and remembrance the wonderful achievements in academic, athletic and humanitarian distinction of Quincy Williams.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: Honors in praise and remembrance Quincy Gemal Williams, a graduate of the Andy DeKaney High School of the Spring Independent School District in Houston, Texas, for his achievements in academic, athletic, and humanitarian distinction.
